member.name: T:csharp_prs.Prs
member.summary: Provides a means by which the underlying D language library's functions may be accessed.

member.name: M:csharp_prs.Prs.Compress(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Compresses a supplied byte array. Returns the compressed version of the byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing the file or data to compress.

(Default = 0x1FFF) A value preferably between 0xFF and 0x1FFF that declares how many bytes the compressor visit before any specific byte to search for matching patterns. Increasing this value compresses the data to smaller filesizes at the expense of compression time. Changing this value has no noticeable effect on decompression time.

member.name: M:csharp_prs.Prs.Decompress(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decompresses a supplied array of PRS compressed bytes and returns a decompressed copy of said bytes.
member.param: The individual PRS compressed data to decompress.

member.name: M:csharp_prs.Prs.Decompress(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decompresses a supplied array of PRS compressed bytes and returns a decompressed copy of said bytes.
member.param: The individual PRS compressed data to decompress.
The length of the individual PRS compressed data array to decompress.

member.name: M:csharp_prs.Prs.Estimate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes the PRS compressed stream and returns the size of the PRS compressed file, if it were to be decompressed. This operation is approximately 18 times faster than decompressing and may be useful in some situations.
member.param: The individual PRS compressed data to get the size of after decompression.

member.name: M:csharp_prs.Prs.Estimate(System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes the PRS compressed stream and returns the size of the PRS compressed file, if it were to be decompressed. This operation is approximately 18 times faster than decompressing and may be useful in some situations.
member.param: The individual PRS compressed data to get the size of after decompression.
The length of the individual PRS compressed data array to decompress.
